Docs.summary: Represents the range of characters and its width measurement for collapsed text within a line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Line collapsing is the ability to reduce displaying space for a line by not showing part of the line's text. Depending on the collapsing style, a collapsing symbol may be shown at the location where the collapsed text occurred.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of characters for the collapsed text.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of collapsed text characters.

Docs.summary: Gets the index to the first character in the that represents collapsed text characters.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index of the first collapsed text character.

Docs.summary: The total width of collapsed text characters.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the width of the collapsed text characters.
